actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that the repeal of the earnings limitation under title II of the Social Security Act for individuals age 70 and over, which is presently scheduled to take effect in 1982, shall instead become effective immediately.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that the repeal of the earnings limitation under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act for individuals age 70 and older, scheduled to take effect in 1982, shall instead become effective immediately.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the repeal of the earnings limitation under title II of the Social Security Act for individuals age 70 and over, which is presently scheduled to take effect in 1982, shall instead become effective immediately.
